ca8475f5-9701-4257-82b0-bb9885dfe005.description: The Faculty Mentoring Program at Our Lady of the Lake University is designed to provide comprehensive guidance and support to faculty members as they navigate their careers in academia. The program will run from February 2023 to May 2025, covering a range of topics that are crucial to advancing in the academic career ladder. The program will consist of monthly mentoring sessions, each of which will focus on a different topic related to academic career advancement.
ca8475f5-9701-4257-82b0-bb9885dfe005.name: Faculty Mentoring Program: Mentee 2023-2024

The program will consist of monthly mentoring sessions, each of which will focus on a different topic related to academic career advancement.

1cf3fbce-8850-44e9-a214-b76a2a959bd3.description: Badge earners will have attended the Teaching Philosophy workshop held on February 8, 2023. Workshop attendees were guided on how to develop a personal teaching philosophy. A teaching philosophy reflects personal values and beliefs about teaching. Faculty were taught how to develop a self-reflective statement that describes both what they believe and provides concrete examples of what they do in the classroom to support those beliefs.
1cf3fbce-8850-44e9-a214-b76a2a959bd3.name: Educator Development: Developing a Teaching Philosophy at OLLU

2c9da5fd-5c17-4a12-8d59-001f26de2f4c.description: Blackboard Ultra Training Series 1 Part B Getting your course ultra-ready This class dives into "ultra-prepping." Participants will get a granular view of what needs to change in their courses in order for them to more easily "make the switch" to Bb Ultra. Topics covered include course organization & folder structure, course tools, test question types, and more!
2c9da5fd-5c17-4a12-8d59-001f26de2f4c.name: Blackboard Learn Ultra: Getting your course Ultra-Ready at OLLU

f549d362-d537-4bc7-862b-856d52811dde.description: Earners of this badge have attended and participated in an introduction to creating surveys. ff63a1be-3989-497e-a100-300defeac0db.description: Congratulations on your participation in the University's Celebration of Teaching and Learning! We are pleased to present you with a badge as a token of our appreciation for your valuable contribution to the event. The Celebration of Teaching and Learning Participation Badge is awarded to all presenters who have demonstrated a commitment to advancing the field of education and sharing their knowledge with our academic community. Your participation in this event highlights your dedication to you

0f159f3d-5008-4880-8a39-975a01e32b32.description: A METHOD OF ASSESSMENT WHERE STUDENTS DEMONSTRATE THEIR KNOWLEDGE BY CONSTRUCTING AN ANSWER, PRODUCING A PRODUCT, OR PERFORMING AN ACTIVITY. ASSESSMENTS CAN BE DESIGNED SO THAT STUDENTS CHOOSE THEIR TOPIC OR SELECT THE BEST WAY TO DEMONSTRATE THEIR UNDERSTANDING. PERFORMANCE-BASED ASSESSMENTS ARE ONE STRATEGY FOR LOWERING THE INCENTIVE TO CHEAT IN ONLINE COURSES AND/OR ONLINE EXAMS. LIMITED TO 15 PEOPLE OBTAIN A PERFORMANCE-BASED ASSESSMENT CHAMPION" BADGE

a6b4a858-bb2a-408f-b2e6-23705b1a001a.description: Dr. Sanborn has demonstrated excellence in leadership in his teaching and service to his discipline and to the entire university. He serves as the MA/MFA Graduate Program Head, Chair of Veteran’s Day Ceremony, and point of contact for the Professional and Technical Writing program. Dr. Sanborn also is an international scholar on the works of Cormac McCarthy. He has been cited over 100 times.
a6b4a858-bb2a-408f-b2e6-23705b1a001a.name: MOODY PROFESSORSHIP 22-23
